snippet: N.B.A. analyst Charles Barkley has blasted the quality of play in the N.B.A. this season, particularly that of the Dallas Mavericks and Dirk Nowitzki.
abstract: N.B.A. analyst Charles Barkley has blasted the quality of play in the N.B.A. this season, particularly that of the Dallas Mavericks and Dirk Nowitzki.

headline.main: Barkley Takes Aim at N.B.A., Bad Teams and Nowitzki
